Nightlight/Windlord/Trinity::

"HEY!!!!" shouted Trinity when she felt that someone was grabbing 
her  "Let me go!!!! I want' to show that bully-bot to let be alone my 
friends!!! I  don't want that no one wurt my friends!!!!!"


"Grounded don't let that she face him..."screammed Windlord "HE's 
MOST DANGEROUS THAN YOU CAN BELIVE!!! I'll go to help 
Aerotaur...Nightlight, Stay here.."


WIndlord ran after them, Nightlight looked a second to Trinity and 
later she saw in the direction that Windlord took, as if she didn't 
know what to do... after several seconds she looked at Trinity again 
and said "Grounder,... Bruning Hammer -I beg you... Look after 
Trinity while I come back, don't let that no one hurt her... I'll 
back soon, I promise you ..."  

She ran, following Windlord.

"NO NO!!!!" Sobbed Trinity, while she try to follow them "I DON'T 
LIKE LOST YOU... i DON'T... COME BACK.. i'LL BE GOOD AND i WON'T GIVE 
YOU MORE TROUBLES... i'LL BEHAVE...I DON'T LIKE LOST YOU LIKE MY DAD 
AND MY MOM..."

Trinity continued sobbing
